summary: Remake of the 1958 classic, in which two convicts of different color must cooperate in order to survive when they manage to escape a chain gang sentence.
cast: Robert Urich|Carl Weathers|Ed Lauter|Barry Corbin|Laurie O'Brien|Thalmus Rasulala|William Sanderson|Ritch Brinkley|Ebbe Roe Smith|Wil Wheaton|Charles Bartlett|Richard Fullerton|Bob Harris
title: Fugitivos
